title: How to Make Mexican White Cheese Sauce

steps.headline: Heat a medium sized sauce-pan over medium heat and melt the butter.
Reduce heat to medium-low and stir in shredded cheese until melted.
Mix in sour cream and green chilies and cook.
steps.description: Stir the mixture occasionally just until heated thoroughly. Make sure it doesn't simmer or boil. You want to just heat it on low heat.

steps.headline: Stir constantly until all cheese is melted.
Serve hot in your favourite dish or with tortilla chips.

text: Heat a medium sized sauce-pan over medium heat and melt the butter.  Reduce heat to medium-low and stir in shredded cheese until melted.  Mix in sour cream and green chilies and cook. Stir the mixture occasionally just until heated thoroughly. Make sure it doesn't simmer or boil. You want to just heat it on low heat. Stir constantly until all cheese is melted.  Serve hot in your favourite dish or with tortilla chips.
